column4: Hi Folks! Is there an easy way to make my laptop work as a radioclock/alarm while in hotels?

ActionParsnip,bazhang: to be more specific; I want to enter a time when I go to bed; turn the laptop off and it then wakes up at the specified time and starts playing a playlist/web-channel/mp3/divx/...
I'm using 11.04 and hoped such things would go via GUI
the only thing I know of capable "timed events" is CRON... have you searched for a GUI for CRON jobs?
